item.description:
Weather for Boston on Saturday is 81 Degrees and Sunny.
(That's 27.22 for you Europeans who still use the inferior metric system.)

I can't get out of Boston so I thought I would lead a meetup at Quincy. I will also bring a frisbee to toss around.

For Directions click here. Do not just Google Quincy Quarries or enter it in your GPS because they will send you to the wrong location.

This is a good trip for beginning climbers as it will be mostly top rope. You should know how to belay and have your own equipment though.

Please RSVP if you have a rope so I can make sure we have a good ratio of climbers to Ropes I will probably only be there until 230 or so but it should be a good time without me.

Pease send me a message if you have any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: By the cut of my jib...
item.name: SUMMERTIME....And the Living is easy!
